name: Self-Help for the Elderly (Lady Shaw Senior Center) [DEACTIVATED]
description: COVID Update (12/17/2020): The Lady Shaw Senior Center is currently closed, and all of their services are unavailable. Special events and classes are cancelled until further notice. Meal delivery services will continue. For more information, call 415-677-7600. A multi-service agency that provides a broad range of bilingual/bi-cultural social, recreational, and educational services to seniors and individuals with disabilities.
